hero.title: ShipFire: Build Your SaaS Website in 3 Minutes
hero.description: A free website builder designed for global indie developers. Launch your product in 48 hours with zero code and built-in AI optimization tools.

introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is ShipFire
introduce.label: OVERVIEW
introduce.description: A SaaS website-building platform tailored for global-facing developers to help your product reach users worldwide instantly.

items.title: ShipFire Free Website Builder
items.description: A completely free online building system—no coding required. It integrates key modules such as payment systems, user management, and analytics. The drag-and-drop interface lets you focus on your product while we handle the tech. Go live in just 3 minutes.

items.title: ShipFire AI Optimization Engine
items.description: Built-in AI analyzes user behavior automatically. The AI assistant provides real-time improvement suggestions that boost conversions by up to 40%. From copywriting to layout tweaks, your site stays in peak marketing condition without hiring a team.

items.title: ShipFire Online One-Click Deployment
items.description: Cloud hosting ensures 99.9% uptime. Global CDN delivers fast access for users worldwide. Automatic SSL, domain binding, and SEO optimization are all included—zero technical barrier so founders can focus fully on their product.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Why Developers Choose ShipFire
benefit.label: Core Benefits
benefit.description: Zero-cost startup with professional-grade features so your SaaS wins from day one.

items.title: Truly Zero Cost
items.description: ShipFire is 100% free with no hidden fees. Features that cost $49–299/month elsewhere—unlimited pages, user management, payment integration, analytics dashboards—are all unlocked here. Ideal for indie developers, saving thousands in early costs so you can invest in product and marketing instead.

items.title: Lightning Fast
items.description: From creating an account to publishing your website takes only 3 minutes. Choose from 50+ templates optimized for SaaS, customize, and publish. Compared to the 2–4 weeks required for traditional development, ShipFire helps you enter the market a month earlier. Automated workflows handle updates and backups so you can focus on growth.

items.title: Optimized for Global Expansion
items.description: Deeply understands the needs of global-facing developers. Supports 20+ languages with auto-translation, multi-currency payments, and GDPR-compliant data handling. Integrated Google Analytics and Meta Pixel help you track overseas performance. With servers across 15 regions, users in the US and Europe experience near-local speeds.

usage.name: usage
usage.label: HOW TO USE
usage.title: How to Build a ShipFire Website
usage.description: Create a professional website in three steps—fully online in just 180 seconds.

items.title: Select Template
items.description: Browse 50+ carefully crafted SaaS templates covering tools, services, communities, and more. Each is optimized for conversions—just pick and start customizing.

items.title: Customize Your Content
items.description: Use the ShipFire Online Editor to modify text, images, and colors. The AI assistant suggests copy and layout based on your product type. Preview changes instantly.

items.title: Publish with One Click
items.description: Click Publish to automatically configure domain binding, SSL certificates, and CDN deployment. Your website goes live instantly and updates are equally effortless.

feature.name: feature
feature.label: FEATURES
feature.title: ShipFire Core Features Overview
feature.description: Enterprise-level capabilities made simple for indie developers, powering your product’s growth.

items.title: Visual Editor
items.description: Drag-and-drop interface with real-time preview. A library of 50+ components allows you to create custom layouts without design skills.

items.title: User Authentication System
items.description: Supports email, Google, GitHub, and more. Automatically manages permissions and subscription tiers. Built-in trial and upgrade flows boost retention by 35%.

items.title: Payment Integration
items.description: Integrated with Stripe and PayPal. Handles subscription billing, invoices, refunds, and more—freeing you from backend complexity.

items.title: Analytics Dashboard
items.description: Track user behavior, funnels, and revenue trends in real time. Clear visual charts help you discover growth opportunities and boost ROI by up to 50%.

items.title: Automatic SEO Optimization
items.description: Generates titles, descriptions, and schema markup automatically. Auto-submits to search engines and optimizes loading speed for higher Google rankings.

items.title: Email Marketing Tools
items.description: Built-in email sending for welcome messages, product updates, campaigns, and more. A/B testing helps you discover high-performing copy, increasing open rates by 45%.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Can't find the answer to your question? Contact us for help.

items.title: Is ShipFire free?
items.description: Yes. ShipFire offers a permanently free plan with unlimited pages, user management, payment integration, analytics, and more. No credit card required and no hidden fees. Full commercial use is allowed.

items.title: Which platforms does ShipFire Online support?
items.description: Supports custom domains, Vercel, Netlify, and other major hosting platforms. A free *.shipfire.app subdomain is available for testing. SSL and CDN are configured automatically for global performance.

items.title: Can I use ShipFire without technical experience?
items.description: Absolutely. ShipFire is designed for non-technical users with a drag-and-drop editor, tutorials, and an AI assistant that provides real-time guidance. Thousands of beginners have built websites with an average learning time under 30 minutes.

items.title: Can I use ShipFire websites for commercial purposes?
items.description: Yes. Websites built with ShipFire are fully commercial-ready, including selling products, subscriptions, and ads. There are no licensing restrictions or revenue sharing.

items.title: Can I export or migrate my ShipFire website?
items.description: Yes, you can export full website code including HTML, CSS, and config files. You can migrate to your own server anytime. User and order data can also be exported as CSV for full data ownership.

items.title: What can ShipFire’s AI features do?
items.description: The AI assistant optimizes copy, suggests layout improvements, analyzes user behavior, and predicts conversion bottlenecks. It supports SEO optimization, A/B test generation, and email content creation—trained on data from 50,000+ sites with 92% recommendation accuracy.

cta.name: cta
cta.title: Start Building with ShipFire Today
cta.description: No credit card needed. No technical skills required. Build a professional site in 3 minutes. Join 50,000+ global developers and reach users worldwide. All core features are free forever.

brand.title: ShipFire
brand.description: ShipFire is dedicated to helping global indie developers quickly build professional SaaS websites with zero code, providing free, high-quality website building solutions with built-in AI optimization tools.
